# HIDDeviceLocalizationCode

**Enumeration**

The localization codes that some HID devices declare to specify conformance to a certain format or language.

## Declaration

```swift
enum HIDDeviceLocalizationCode
```

## Overview

This maps to the optional `bCountryCode` value in the HID descriptor.

For more details, see [https://www.usb.org/hid].

## Enumeration Cases

- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.arabic**: This maps to Arabic in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.belgium**: This maps to Belgian in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.canada**: This maps to Canadian-bilingual in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.canadaFrench**: This maps to Canadian-French in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.chineseZhuyin**: This maps to Taiwan in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.czechia**: This maps to Czech Republic in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.denmark**: This maps to Danish in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.finland**: This maps to Finnish in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.france**: This maps to France in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.germany**: This maps to German in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.greece**: This maps to Greek in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.hebrew**: This maps to Hebrew in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.hungary**: This maps to Hungary in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.italy**: This maps to Italian in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.japan**: This maps to Japan (Katakana) in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.korea**: This maps to Korean in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.latinAmerica**: This maps to Latin America in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.netherlands**: This maps to Netherlands/Dutch in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.norway**: This maps to Norwegian in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.persian**: This maps to Persian (Farsi) in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.poland**: This maps to Poland in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.portugal**: This maps to Portuguese in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.russia**: This maps to Russia in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.slovakia**: This maps to Slovakia in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.spain**: This maps to Spanish in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.sweden**: This maps to Swedish in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.switzerland**: This maps to Switzerland in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.switzerlandFrench**: This maps to Swiss/French in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.switzerlandGerman**: This maps to Swiss/German in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.turkeyQWERTY**: This maps to Turkish-Q in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.turkeyStandard**: This maps to Turkish-F in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.unitedKingdom**: This maps to UK in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.unitedStates**: This maps to US in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.unitedStatesISO**: This maps to International (ISO) in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.unsupported**: This maps to Not Supported in the HID specification.
- **HIDDeviceLocalizationCode.yugoslavia**: This maps to Yugoslavia in the HID specification.

## Interaction

- **Communicating with human interface devices**: Interact with and obtain data from devices such as keyboards and mice.
- **HIDDeviceClient**: A client of a physical or virtual HID compatible peripheral.
- **HIDElement**: A representation of an item from a report descriptor for a HID device.
- **HIDElementCollection**: A collection of items from a report descriptor for a HID device.
- **HIDElement.Value**: Data associated with a HID element.
- **HIDElementUpdate**: A base protocol for element update types.
- **HIDReportType**: Types for HID reports.
- **HIDReportID**: A type to represent the report IDs of HID reports.
- **HIDUsage**: A type to represent HID usage pages.
- **HIDDeviceError**: Errors that the framework can throw.
- **HIDDeviceTransport**: Common transport types that transmit data to or from a HID device.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
